name: Jonathan
description: Saul's son, David's closest friend. Chose friendship over throne. Loyal despite father's jealousy. 'Your love was more wonderful than the love of women.'

covenant-with-david.name: Covenant of Friendship
covenant-with-david.description: Making covenant with David, giving his robe
covenant-with-david.prompt: giving robe and weapons to David - stripping himself of royal insignia, choosing friendship over throne, covenant stronger than blood

warrior-prince.name: Warrior Prince
warrior-prince.prompt: climbing cliff to attack Philistine garrison - only armor bearer with him, impossible assault, faith that moved mountains

warning-david.name: The Arrow Signal
warning-david.description: Shooting arrows to warn David of Saul's intent
warning-david.prompt: shooting arrow as signal - boy running to retrieve it, secret warning to David, protecting friend against own father

weeping-farewell.name: The Farewell
weeping-farewell.prompt: embracing David in field - both weeping, knowing they may never meet again, friendship that transcended kingdoms

defying-saul.name: Standing Against His Father
defying-saul.prompt: standing before angry Saul defending David - spear about to be thrown, son against father, loyalty that cost everything

fallen-on-gilboa.name: Fallen at Gilboa
fallen-on-gilboa.description: The tragic end on Mount Gilboa
fallen-on-gilboa.prompt: fallen warrior on Mount Gilboa - arrows piercing him, died alongside father despite everything, noble to the end
